extension.description: Agent-first terminal notifier for VS Code/Cursor. Detects Codex and Claude task completion events and lets notification clicks jump back to the exact terminal tab.
config.title: Agent Task Notifier
config.enabled.description: Enable or disable agent task notifications.
config.vscodeToast.description: Show VS Code toast notifications with a focus action.
config.dedupeWindowMs.description: Suppress duplicate notifications seen within this time window.
config.strictWindowRouting.description: Only accept deep-link focus requests that match this window token.
config.logLevel.description: Logging level for the Agent Task Notifier output channel.
command.enable.title: Agent Task Notifier: Enable
command.disable.title: Agent Task Notifier: Disable
command.testNotification.title: Agent Task Notifier: Test Notification
command.showLogs.title: Agent Task Notifier: Show Logs
command.debugStatus.title: Agent Task Notifier: Debug Status
command.repairCodexNotify.title: Agent Task Notifier: Repair Codex Notify
command.repairClaudeHooks.title: Agent Task Notifier: Repair Claude Hooks
